body: At 15th level, you can grow insectlike wings from your back and become one size category smaller (as if you had used reduce person), gaining a fly speed of 60 feet with average maneuverability. You can maintain this form for 1 minute per level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1-minute increments. This bloodline power replaces fey magic.
name: Fey Wings
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Sorcerer/Sorcerer Archetypes/Wildblooded/Sylvan/Bloodline Powers/Fey Wings
